---
title: "2 separate"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(janitor)

analytic = read.csv("./analytic.csv")

individual_foods_1 <- read_xpt_clean("./Individual_Foods_1.xpt")
individual_foods_2 <- read_xpt_clean("./Individual_Foods_2.xpt")




# filter id
id1 <- individual_foods_1  |>
  distinct(seqn) |>
  pull(seqn)

id2 <- individual_foods_2 |>
  distinct(seqn) |>
  pull(seqn)

# cross check
habit_ids <- intersect(id1, id2)

# label
analytic2 <- analytic |>
  mutate(
    coffee_habit = if_else(
      seqn %in% habit_ids,
      "habit",      
      "no_habit"    
    )
  )

# yes
coffee_habit_yes <- analytic2 |>
  filter(coffee_habit == "habit")

# no
coffee_habit_no <- analytic2 |>
  filter(coffee_habit == "no_habit")

coffee_habit_yes
coffee_habit_no
```
